tool_description: Analyzes workplace incidents to identify contributing risk factors, root causes, and potential prevention measures for future incident mitigation.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

equipment_involved.description: Equipment or machinery involved in incident

human_factors.description: Human factors that may have contributed

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
No risk factors provided: At least one category of risk factors should be provided for analysis.
Invalid factor description: Each factor must be at least 5 characters long.
usage: Provide incident_id and arrays of relevant risk factors across environmental, equipment, human, and procedural categories. The tool will analyze these factors to identify root causes and prevention opportunities.

primary_root_cause.description: Identified primary root cause of the incident

contributing_factors.description: List of contributing risk factors identified

risk_level.description: Overall risk level assessment (low, medium, high)
